concept.title: N1QL language reference
concept.shortdesc: The language reference guide describes the N1QL syntax and also provides information to run N1QL queries from a command line.

conbody.p: The N1QL language structure is composed of statements, expressions, and comments. See for details.
You can use the command line tool cbq to run N1QL queries. See for details.
The N1QL language reference guide also provides reference information about the basic elements in N1QL. These basic elements can be combined to build N1QL statements.
